20101217025325.750|20101217025327.000|CCO|    
20101217025327.000|20101217025328.250|CCO|    that's caused by a clot,
20101217025328.250|20101217025329.500|CCO|    
20101217025329.500|20101217025330.750|CCO|    one that could be fatal.
20101217025330.750|20101217025332.000|CCO|    But PLAVIX helps save lives.
20101217025332.000|20101217025332.588|CCO|    
20101217025332.588|20101217025333.176|CCO|          PLAVIX, taken with
20101217025333.176|20101217025333.765|CCO|    
20101217025333.765|20101217025334.353|CCO|      other heart medicines,
20101217025334.353|20101217025334.941|CCO|

20101217025335.529|20101217025336.118|CCO|

20101217025336.706|20101217025337.294|CCO|  to provide greater protection
20101217025337.294|20101217025337.882|CCO|    
20101217025337.882|20101217025338.471|CCO|        against heart attack
20101217025338.471|20101217025339.059|CCO|

20101217025339.647|20101217025340.235|CCO|        
20101217025340.235|20101217025340.824|CCO|              by helping
20101217025340.824|20101217025341.412|CCO|    
20101217025341.412|20101217025342.000|CCO|    to keep blood platelets
20101217025342.000|20101217025342.500|CCO|

20101217025343.000|20101217025343.500|CCO|
20101217025343.500|20101217025344.000|CCO|    and forming dangerous clots.
20101217025344.000|20101217025344.500|CCO|        
20101217025344.500|20101217025345.000|CCO|        Ask your doctor
20101217025345.000|20101217025345.500|CCO|
20101217025345.500|20101217025346.000|CCO|    if PLAVIX is right for you.
20101217025346.000|20101217025346.500|CCO|    
20101217025346.500|20101217025347.000|CCO|      Protection that helps
20101217025347.000|20101217025347.500|CCO|        
20101217025347.500|20101217025348.000|CCO|            save lives.
20101217025348.000|20101217025348.500|CCO|    
20101217025348.500|20101217025349.000|CCO|        [ Female Announcer ]
20101217025349.000|20101217025349.500|CCO|    
20101217025349.500|20101217025350.000|CCO|    Certain genetic factors
20101217025350.000|20101217025350.500|CCO|    
20101217025350.500|20101217025351.000|CCO|        and some medicines,
20101217025351.000|20101217025351.500|CCO|    
20101217025351.500|20101217025352.000|CCO|          such as Prilosec,
20101217025352.000|20101217025352.714|CCO|    reduce the effect of PLAVIX
20101217025352.714|20101217025353.429|CCO|    leaving you at greater risk
20101217025353.429|20101217025354.143|CCO|
20101217025354.143|20101217025354.857|CCO|    for heart attack and stroke.
20101217025354.857|20101217025355.571|CCO|    
20101217025355.571|20101217025356.286|CCO|        Your doctor may use
20101217025356.286|20101217025357.000|CCO|

20101217025357.714|20101217025358.429|CCO|    
20101217025358.429|20101217025359.143|CCO|    to determine treatment.
20101217025359.143|20101217025359.857|CCO|    
20101217025359.857|20101217025400.571|CCO|    Don't stop taking PLAVIX
20101217025400.571|20101217025401.286|CCO|
20101217025401.286|20101217025402.000|CCO|  without talking to your doctor
20101217025402.000|20101217025402.625|CCO|    as your risk of heart attack
20101217025402.625|20101217025403.250|CCO|    
20101217025403.250|20101217025403.875|CCO|    or stroke may increase.
20101217025403.875|20101217025404.500|CCO|  People with stomach ulcers or
20101217025404.500|20101217025405.125|CCO|
20101217025405.125|20101217025405.750|CCO|  conditions that cause bleeding
20101217025405.750|20101217025406.375|CCO|    
20101217025406.375|20101217025407.000|CCO|      should not use PLAVIX.
20101217025407.000|20101217025407.625|CCO|    
20101217025407.625|20101217025408.250|CCO|        Taking PLAVIX alone
20101217025408.250|20101217025408.875|CCO|
20101217025408.875|20101217025409.500|CCO|  or with some other medicines,
20101217025409.500|20101217025410.125|CCO|    
20101217025410.125|20101217025410.750|CCO|          including aspirin,
20101217025410.750|20101217025411.375|CCO|
20101217025411.375|20101217025412.000|CCO|    may increase bleeding risk,
20101217025412.000|20101217025412.714|CCO|    
20101217025412.714|20101217025413.429|CCO|        so tell your doctor
20101217025413.429|20101217025414.143|CCO|    
20101217025414.143|20101217025414.857|CCO|      when planning surgery.
20101217025414.857|20101217025415.571|CCO|        
20101217025415.571|20101217025416.286|CCO|        Tell your doctor
20101217025416.286|20101217025417.000|CCO|    
20101217025417.000|20101217025417.714|CCO|    all medicines you take,
20101217025417.714|20101217025418.429|CCO|  including aspirin, especially
20101217025418.429|20101217025419.143|CCO|    
20101217025419.143|20101217025419.857|CCO|    if you've had a stroke.
20101217025419.857|20101217025420.571|CCO|  If fever, unexplained weakness
20101217025420.571|20101217025421.286|CCO|    
20101217025421.286|20101217025422.000|CCO|      or confusion develops,
20101217025422.000|20101217025422.769|CCO|      tell your doctor promptly.
20101217025422.769|20101217025423.538|CCO|      These may be signs of TTP,
20101217025423.538|20101217025424.308|CCO|    
20101217025424.308|20101217025425.077|CCO|      a rare but potentially
20101217025425.077|20101217025425.846|CCO|
20101217025425.846|20101217025426.615|CCO|    life-threatening condition,
20101217025426.615|20101217025427.385|CCO|    reported sometimes less than
20101217025427.385|20101217025428.154|CCO|
20101217025428.154|20101217025428.923|CCO|  2 weeks after starting PLAVIX.
20101217025428.923|20101217025429.692|CCO|    
20101217025429.692|20101217025430.462|CCO|    Other rare but serious
20101217025430.462|20101217025431.231|CCO|    
20101217025431.231|20101217025432.000|CCO|    side effects may occur.
20101217025432.000|20101217025432.833|CCO|    
20101217025432.833|20101217025433.667|CCO|    IT'S THAT TIME OF YEAR.
